project.title: Scalable Time Series Forecasting for Product-Level Sales
project.shortDescription: Developed a high-scale, parallelized forecasting system to predict product-level sales using Azure's many-models architecture.
project.description: InteliChain partnered with ScaleUp Labs to develop a scalable time series forecasting system aimed at predicting future sales for each product based on historical data. Recognizing the unique stability and profitability characteristics of each product, the solution employed a many-models approach, training and evaluating multiple forecasting models per product to select the best fit. Leveraging Azure's parallel computing capabilities, the system efficiently handled large-scale data processing, enabling accurate and timely sales predictions across the entire product portfolio.
project.metrics: Achieved a 92% average accuracy in sales forecasts, reduced model training time by 65%, and enabled dynamic inventory adjustments leading to a 20% decrease in stockouts.
project.results: The implementation led to significant improvements in sales forecasting accuracy and operational efficiency, allowing for proactive inventory management and enhanced decision-making processes.

testimonial.quote: ScaleUp Labs built a forecasting engine that changed the way we manage our inventory and sales. Their scalable approach and attention to our business needs resulted in more accurate predictions and a smoother operation overall.
testimonial.author: Roei Aviram

project.challenges: Building a scalable forecasting system required handling large volumes of product-level data, ensuring model accuracy for diverse products, and optimizing parallel processing for efficiency.
project.solutions: Implemented a many-models architecture on Azure, leveraging parallel computing to train and select the best forecasting model per product, resulting in high accuracy and efficient large-scale processing.
